BuildTest

                                   testbed.sim.AppraisalAssignment art)
Helper function that will builds a test

Parameters:
Enum - for the tree that is to be queried
Agent - that this query regards to
Era - in which this query regards to
boolean - as to whether certainty is for this agent or other agent
art - piece to be appraised
Returns:
Comma separated string test
